name: Globe Master
overview: Globe Master is a set of educational programs utilizing 8 high resolution color maps for the study of geography. The student learning states & capitals, European countries, or continents and oceans will find Globe Master makes learning easier. The advanced student or adult will find Globe Master a challenging game to "brush up" on Asian and African countries or to learn more about Australian & Asian cities. User friendly software options reduce the importance of exact spelling and permit four levels of skill. The most complete and graphic program of its kind. It's time to put your Atari Personal Computer to work and make learning fun.
